verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to the <S%H7799>Shoshannim.<s%> A Maskil of the sons of) (Korah. A Song of Love.) My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7370>overflows<s%> with a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>theme;<s%> I <S%H559>address<s%> my <S%H4639>verses<s%> to the <S%H4428>King;<s%> My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is the <S%H5842>pen<s%> of a <S%H4106>ready<s%> <S%H9373>writer.<s%>

Thou art <S%H3302>fairer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men;<s%> <S%H2580>Grace<s%> is <S%H3332>poured<s%> upon Thy <S%H8193>lips;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> Thee <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
<S%H2296>Gird<s%> Thy <S%H2719>sword<s%> on [Thy] <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> O <S%H1368>Mighty<s%> <S%H1368>One,<s%> [In] Thy <S%H1935>splendor<s%> and Thy <S%H1926>majesty!<s%>

And in Thy <S%H1926>majesty<s%> <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6743>victoriously,<s%> For the <S%H1697>cause<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H6038>meekness<s%> [and] <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> Let Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H3384>teach<s%> Thee <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H3372>things.<s%>
Thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp;<s%> The <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> Thee; [Thine arrows are] in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the King's <S%H340>enemies.<s%>
Thy <S%H3678>throne,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> is <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever;<s%> A <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of <S%H4334>uprightness<s%> is the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of Thy <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> Thy <S%H430>God,<s%> has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> Thee With the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> Thy <S%H2270>fellows.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> Thy <S%H899>garments<s%> are [fragrant with] <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H174>aloes<s%> [and] <S%H7102>cassia;<s%> Out of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1964>palaces<s%> <S%H4482>stringed<s%> <S%H4482>instruments<s%> have <S%H8055>made<s%> Thee <S%H8055>glad.<s%>

Kings' <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are among Thy <S%H3368>noble<s%> ladies; At Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H5324>stands<s%> the <S%H7694>queen<s%> in <S%H3800>gold<s%> from <S%H211>Ophir.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H7200>give<s%> <S%H7200>attention<s%> and <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear;<s%> <S%H7911>Forget<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> and your father's <S%H1004>house;<s%>
Then the <S%H4428>King<s%> will <S%H183>desire<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> He is your <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to Him.
And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> [will come] with a <S%H4503>gift;<s%> The <S%H6223>rich<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H9134>entreat<s%> your <S%H6440>favor.<s%>
The King's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> is <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H6441>within;<s%> Her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is <S%H4865>interwoven<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

She will be <S%H2986>led<s%> to the <S%H4428>King<s%> in <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H7553>work;<s%> The <S%H1330>virgins,<s%> her <S%H7464>companions<s%> who <S%H310>follow<s%> her, Will be <S%H935>brought<s%> to Thee.
They will be <S%H2986>led<s%> <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>rejoicing;<s%> They will <S%H935>enter<s%> into the King's <S%H1964>palace.<s%>
In <S%H8478>place<s%> of your fathers will be your <S%H1>sons;<s%> You shall <S%H1121>make<s%> them <S%H7896>princes<s%> in <S%H8269>all<s%> the <S%H3605>earth.<s%>

I will cause Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will <S%H3034>give<s%> Thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
